Nandao tamen meiyou guancha zai tamen shangmian he xiamian de tiandi ma? Ruguo wo yiyu, wo bi shi tamen lunxian zai dimian xia, huo shi tian yikuai yikuai di luo zai tamen de tou shang. Duiyu mei yige guiyi de puren, ci zhong que youyi zhong jixiang
Wo que yi shangci da wu de cong wo fachu de enhui. Qun shan a! Zhong niao a! Nimen yingdang hezhe ta de zansong. Wo wei ta shi tie rouruan
(wo dui ta shuo):“Ni yingdang zhizao wanshan de kaijia, ni yingdang dinghao kaijia de kuandu. Nimen ying dang xingshan, wo que shi mingcha nimen de xingwei de.”

Wo ceng shi feng gong su lai man qushi, feng zai shangwu zou yi yue de lucheng, zai xiawu ye zou yi yue de lucheng. Wo wei ta shi rong tong xiang quanshui yang yong chu. Youxie jingling feng zhu de mingling zai ta de mianqian gongzuo; shei weibeile wo de mingling, wo jiu shi shei changshi liehuo de xingfa
Tamen wei ta xiujian tasuo yiyu de gongdian, diaoxiang, shuichi ban de dapan, guding de da guo.(Wo shuo):“Da wu de de jiashu a! Nimen yingdang ganxie.” Wo de puren zhong, ganxie zhe shi hen shao de

Wo jueding ta siwang de shihou, zhiyou chi ta de shouzhang de zhuchong, zhishi tamen ta yijing sile. Dang ta dao xiaqu de shihou, jinglingmen huangrandawu: Jiaruo tamen neng zhi youxuan, name, tamen weiceng douliu zai lingru de xingfa zhong

Sai bo yi zu, zai tamen de ju chu, que youyi zhong jixiang: Liang ge yuanpu, fen lie zuoyou.“Nimen keyi chi nimen de zhu de jiyang, nimen yao ganxie ta. Yige feimei di difang, yige zhi she de zhuzai.”
Suihou, tamen beini, suoyi wo shi shuiku de jiliu qu yanmo tamen, wo ba tamen de liang ge yuanpu, bian cheng liang ge zhi shengzhang kuguo, chengliu, he xiewei de suanzao shu de yuanpu
Wo yin tamen de wang'en er yi zhe baochou tamen, wo zhi chengfa wang'en de ren
Wo zai tamen yu wo suo fu you di naxie chengshi zhi jian, jianshele xuduo xianzhu de chengshi, wo jun fen ge zhan jian de juli.“Nimen zai qijian ping'an di luxing ruogan zhouye ba!”

Ranhou, tamen shuo:“Women de zhu a! Qiu ni fang zhang ge zhan zhi jian de juli.” Tamen zi qi, suoyi wo yi tamen wei tan zhu. Wo shi tamen liulishisuo. Duiyu mei ge duo ren duoxie de ren, ci zhong que you xuduo jixiang
Yi bo lie si que yi faxian ta dui tamen de caice shi zhengque de, yinwei tamen dou zhuisui ta; zhiyou yi huo xinshi chuwai
Ta dui tamen zhi suoyi you quanli zhe, zhi wei wo yao bianbie shei shi xinyang houshi de, shei shi huaiyi houshi de. Ni de zhu, shi wanwu de jianhu zhe

Ni shuo:“Nimen she an la er ren zuo shenling de, nimen qidao tamen ba, tamen buneng guanli tiandi jian wei chen zhi zhong de shiwu, tamen sihao buneng canyu tiandi de zaohua. An la bu yi tamen zhong de renhe yige wei zhushou.”

Chu an la suo xuke zhe wai, zai an la nali, shuo qing jiang wu biyi. Zhidao tamen xinzhong de kongju bei paichu de shihou, tamen cai shuo:“Nimen de zhu shuole shenme?” Tamen shuo:“Zhenli.” Ta que shi zhigaowushang de, que shi zhi da de
Ni shuo:“Shei cong tianshang he dixia gongji nimen?” Ni shuo:“An la. Women huo nimen, shi zai zhengdao shang de, huo shi zai xianzhu de mi wu zhong de.”
Ni shuo:“Duiyu women suo fan de zui, nimen bu shoushen wen; duiyu nimen suo zuo de shi, women ye bu shoushen wen.”
Ni shuo:“Women de zhu, jiang zhaoji women, ranhou, yi zhenli er wei women caipan, ta que shi zui shanyu caipan de, que shi quanzhi de.”
Ni shuo:“Nimen gaosu wo, nimen suo cheng wei ta de huoban de.” Jue buneng. Buran, ta shi an la, shi wanneng de, shi zhi rui de
Wo zhi paiqian ni wei quan renlei de baoxi zhe he jinggao zhe, dan shiren daban bu zhidao
Tamen shuo:“Ruguo ni shi shuo shihua de, zhege jinggao shenme shihou shixian ne?”
Ni shuo:“Nimen de yue qi shi you shi ri de, nimen bude shaoshao chidao, ye bude shaoshao zao dao.”

Buxindao de renmen shuo:“Women jue buxin zhe “gulanjing”, ye buxin yiqian de jingdian.” Jiaruo ni de jian bu yi de renmen bei juliu zai tamen de zhu nali de shihou, tamen huxiang bianbo, bei qifu de renmen jiang dui jiao'ao de renmen shuo:“Jiaruo meiyou nimen, women biding shi xindao de.”
Jiao'ao de renmen jiang dui bei qifu de renmen shuo:“Dang zhengdao lailin nimen de shihou, women ceng fang'ai nimen zunxun zhengdao ma? Buran, nimen ziyuan zuo fanzui zhe.”

Bei qifu de renmen jiang dui jiao'ao de renmen shuo:“Buran! Zhe shi nimen zhouye de jimou. Dangshi, nimen jiao women buxin an la, que wei ta shuli xuduo de pei di.” Dang tamen kanjian xingfa de shihou, tamen biaoshi huihen. Wo yao ba jiasuo fang zai bu xindao zhe de bozi shang, tamen zhi shou tamen de xingwei de baochou
Mei feng wo paiqian jinggao zhe dao yige chengshiqu, qizhong haohua de renmen zong shi shuo:“Women dique bu xin ni de mingling.”
Tamen shuo:“Women caichan geng fu, er zi geng duo, women jianglai jue bu hui shou chengfa.”
Ni shuo:“Wo de zhu yu shi shei de jiyang kuanyu, jiu shi ta kuanyu; yu shi shei de jiyang jiongpo, jiu shi shei jiongpo. Dan zhongren daban bu zhidao.”
Nimen de caichan, nimen de erzi, dou buneng shi nimen shaoshao de qinjin wo; dan xindao erqie xingshan de renmen, jiang yin tamen de xingwei er shou jiabei de baochou, tamen jiang anju yu lou shang
Jieli fandui wo de jixiang de renmen, jiang bei jujin zai xingfa zhong

Ni shuo:“Wo de zhu, dique yu shi nage puren de jiyang kuanyu, jiu shi ta kuanyu; yu shi nage puren de jiyang jiongpo, jiu shi ta jiongpo. Nimen suo shishe de dongxi, ta jiang buchang ta; ta shi zui you de gongji zhe.”
Zai na ri, ta yao jiang tamen tongtong jihe qilai, ranhou dui tianshimen shuo:“Zhexie ren chongbaiguo nimen ma?”
Tamen shuo:“Women zan ni chaojue wanwu! Ni shi women de zhu, er fei tamen de pengyou. Tamen yuan dang shi chongbai jingling de, tamen daban xinyang jingling.”
Jinri, nimen buneng huli, ye buneng xiang hai; wo jiang dui bu yi de renmen shuo:“Nimen changshi nimen suo fouren de huoxing ba!”

Youren dui tamen xuandu wo de mingbai de jixiang shi, tamen shuo:“Zhege ren zhi xiang fang'ai nimen chongbai nimen de zuxian suo chongbai de ouxiang.” Tamen you shuo:“Zhe zhishi niezao de huangyan.” Dang zhenli lailin de shihou, bu xindao de renmen shuo:“Zhe zhishi yi zhong mingxian de moshu.”
Wo meiyou ba tamen suo neng song xi de renhe jingdian shangci tamen, zai ni zhiqian, wo meiyou paiqian renhe jinggao zhe qu jiaohua tamen
Zai tamen zhiqian shi qu de renmen ceng fouren zhenli, tamen meiyou dadao wo suo ciyu qian ren de shi fen zhi yi, dan qian ren fouren wo de shizhemen, wo de qianze shi zenyang de

Ni shuo:“Wo zhi yi yi jian shi quandao nimen, nimen yingdang wei an la er shuangshuang de huo dandu de zhan qilai, ranhou siwei.” Nimen de tongxiang, jue wu feng bing. Zai yanli de xingfa lailin zhiqian, ta dui nimen zhishi yige jinggao zhe
Ni shuo:“Wo bu xiang nimen suoqu shenme baochou, ta quan gui nimen; wo de baochou, zhi gui an la fudan. Ta shi jianzheng wanwu de.”
Ni shuo:“Wo de zhu, yi zhenli sheji xuwei, ta shi quanzhi youxuan de.”
Ni shuo:“Zhenli yi lailinliao, xuwei jiang huanmie, er bu fuchu.”
Ni shuo:“Ruguo wo wu ru qitu, ze wo zi shou qi hai; ruguo wo zunxun zhengdao, ze youyu wo de zhu suo qishi de jingdian. Ta que shi quan cong de, que shi linjin de.”
Jiaruo ni de jian dangshi tamen kongbu er wu chu taobi, zai yige bu yuan di difang bei daibu
Tamen jiang shuo:“Women yi xinyang tale.” Tamen zen neng cong yaoyuan di difang huode xinyang ne
Tamen yiqian bu xinyang ta, tamen cong yaoyuan di difang wang tan youxuan
tamen jiang yin zhang'ai er buneng huode tamen suo yuwang de. Youru tamen de tonglei yiqian shou zhang'ai yiyang, tamen que zai fannao de yilu zhong

Yiqie zansong, quan gui an la——tiandi de chuangzao zhe! Ta shi mei ge tianshi juyou liangyi, huo san yi, huo si yi. Ta zai chuangzao zhong zengjia tasuo yu zengjia de. An la duiyu wanshi que shi quanneng de
Wulun an la shangci nimen shenme enhui, jue wu ren neng jiayi zulan; wulun ta kouliu shenme enhui, zai jin shi zhihou, jue wu ren neng jiayi kaishi. Ta que shi wanneng de, que shi zhi rui de

Renmen a! Nimen yingdang mingji an la suo ci nimen de enhui, chu an la wai, hai you she me chuangzao zhe neng cong tianshang dixia gongji nimen ma? Chu ta wai, jue wu ying shou chongbai de, nimen zenme ruci beimiu ne
Ruguo tamen fouren ni, name, zai ni zhiqian de shizhemen, yi bei fourenle. Wanshi zhi gui an la
Renmen a! An la de yingxu, que shi zhenshi de, suoyi jue buneng rang jinshi de shenghuo qipian nimen, jue buyao rang hua zei yi an la de yourong qipian nimen
Emo que shi nimen de choudi, suoyi nimen yingdang ren ta wei choudi. Ta zhi haozhao ta de dangyu, yibian tamen zuo liehuo de jumin
Bu xindao zhe, jiang shou yanli de xingfa; xindao erqie xingshan zhe, jiang meng she youhe zhongda de baochou

Wei ziji de e xing suo mihuo, yin'er ren e wei shan zhe, xiang an la suoyindao de ren ma? An la bi shi tasuo yiyu zhe wu ru mitu, bi shi tasuo yiyu zhe zunxun zhengdao, suo yi ni buyao wei aidao tamen er sangsheng, an la que shi quanzhi tamen de xingwei de
An la shi feng qu xingqi yun lai, ranhou, ba yun gan zhi yige yi si di difang, er jie ta shi yi si de dadi fuhuo. Siren de fuhuo jiushi zheyang de
Yu de guangrong zhe, xuzhi guangrong quan gui an la. Liangyan jiang wei tasuo zhi, ta sheng qi shanxing. Tumoubugui zhe, jiang shou yanli de xingfa; zhexie ren de tumou, shi buneng decheng de

An la chuangzao nimen, xian yong nitu, ji yong jingye, ranhou, shi nimen chengwei pei'ou. Renhe nuren de huaiyun he fenmian, wu yi jian bushi tasuo zhidao de; zengjia chang ming zhe de shou shu, jianshao duanming zhe de nianling, wu yi jian bu jilu zai tian jing zhong; na dui an la que shi rongyi de

Liang hai bu yiyang, zhe hai shi hen tian de, kekou de danshui, na hai shi hen ku de xian shui. Nimen ke chi mei yi haizhong suo chan de xinxian de rou, you ke cai nimen suo dai de shoushi. Ni kan chuanbo zai haishang polang er xing, yibian nimen xunqiu ta de enhui, yibian nimen ganxie ta

Ta shi heiye qinru baizhou, shi baizhou qinru heiye; ta zhifu ri yue, gezi yunxing zhi yi dingqi. Zhe shi an la——nimen de zhu, zhuquan zhishi ta de, nimen she ta er chongbai de, buneng guanli yi sihao

Ruguo nimen qidao tamen, tamen ting bujian nimen de qidao; jibian tingjianle, tamen ye buneng daying nimen; fuhuo ri, tamen jiang fouren nimen ceng yi tamen pei an la. Renhe ren buneng xiang che zhi zhe nayang gaosu ni
Renmen a! Nimen cai shi xuqiu an la de, an la que shi wu qiu de, que shi ke song de
Ruguo ta yiyu, ta jiang huimie nimen, er chuangzao xin de zhongsheng
Na dui an la bushi fannan de

Yige fu zui zhe, bu zai fu bieren de zui; yige fuzhong zui zhe, ruguo jiao bieren lai ti ta fu zui, namo, bieren sui shi ta de jinqin, ye buneng ti ta danfu yi sihao. Ni zhi neng jinggao zai mimi zhong jingwei zhu, qie jin shou bai gong zhe. Xidi shenxin zhe, zhi wei ziji er xidi. An la shi weiyi de guisu
Mangren he fei mangren bu xiangdeng
hei'an yu guangming ye bu xiangdeng
beiyin he dang yang ye bu xiangdeng
huo ren he siren ye bu xiangdeng. An la bi shi ta suo yiyu zhe neng tingwen, ni jue buneng shi zai fen zhong de ren neng tingwen
ni zhishi yige jinggao zhe
Wo que yi shi ni ben zhenli er wei baoxi zhe he jinggao zhe. Meiyou yige minzu ze yi, zhiyao you yige minzu, qizhong jiu you jinggao zhe cengjing shiqule
Ruguo tamen fouren ni, name, zai tamen zhiqian shiqu zhe, yi fourenle; tamen zu zhong de shizhe ceng zhaoshi tamen mingzheng, tian jing he canlan de jingdian
Ranhou, wo cheng fa liao bu xindao zhe, wo de qianze shi zenyang de
Nandao ni hai bu zhidao ma? An la cong tianshang jiangxia yushui, ranhou jie yushui er shengchan chu ge zhong guoshi. Shanshang you bai de, hong de, gese de tiaowen, he qihei de yanshi
Renlei, yeshou he shengchu zhong, ye tongyang di you butong de zhonglei. An la de puren zhong, zhiyou xuezhe jingwei ta. An la que shi wanneng de, que shi zhi she de
Songdu an la de jingdian, qie jin shou bai gong, bing mimi de huo gongkai di fen she wo suo ciyu tamen de caiwu zhe, tamen xiwang zhe jingying bu pochan
yibian ta shi tamen xiangshou ziji de wanquan de baochou, bing ba ta de enhui jia ci tamen; ta que shi zhi she de, que shi shan bao de
Wo qishi gei ni de jingdian que shi zhenli, zu zheng yiqian de jingdian shi zhenshi de. An la duiyu ta de pu renmen que shi che zhi de, que shi mingcha de
Ranhou, wo shi wo suo jianxuan de pu renmen jicheng jingdian; tamen zhong you zi qi de, you zhong he de, you feng'an la de mingling er zhengxian xingshan de. Na que shi hong en
Changzhu de leyuan, tamen jiang ru qizhong, tamen zai limian, dai de shi jin zhuo he zhenzhu, chuan de shi sichou
Tamen shuo:“Yiqie zansong, quan gui an la! Ta quchu women de youchou. Women de zhu, que shi zhi she de, que shi shan bao de
Ta shi women juzhu zai changzhu de fangwu zhong, na shi chu yu ta de enhui. Women zai limian, hao bu xinku, hao bu pijuan.”
Buxindao zhe, jiang zao huo yu de xingfa, ji bu pan tamen sixing, rang tamen siwang; you bu jianqing tamen suo zao de huoxing. Wo zheyang baochou yiqie wang'en de renmen

Tamen zai limian qiujiu shuo:“Women de zhu a! Qiu ni fang women chuqu, women jiang gaiguo qian shan.” Nandao wo meiyou yanchang nimen de shou shu, shi neng juewu zhe you juewu de shijian ma? Jinggao zhe yi jianglin nimenle. Nimen changshi xingfa ba, bu yi zhe jue meiyou renhe yuanzhu zhe
An la que shi quanzhi tiandi de youxuan de, ta que shi quanzhi xinshi de

Ta shi nimen wei dadishang de dai zhi zhe. Buxindao zhe zi shou qi buxin de baochou; bu xindao zhe de bu xin, zhi shi tamen zai tamen de zhu nali shou tonghen; bu xindao zhe de bu xin, zhi shi tamen geng meng kui she

Ni shuo:“Nimen gaosu wo ba, nimen she an la er qidao di naxie pei zhu, zenme ying shou chongbai ne? Nimen gaosu wo ba! Tamen ceng duzi chuangzaole da di de na yibufen ne? Haishi tamen ceng yu an la gongtong chuangzao zhu tian ne? Haishi an la ceng shouyu tamen yi ben jingdian, er tamen shi yiju na ben jingdian zhong de xuduo mingzheng ne?” Buran, bu yi zhe jin yi qipian huxiang ying xu
An la dique weichi tiandi, yimian huimie; ruguo tiandi yao huimie, ze chu an la wai, renhe ren buneng weichi ta. Ta que shi zhi rong de, que shi zhi she de

Tamen zhi an la fachu zui yanzhong de shiyan shuo: Ruguo youyige jinggao zhe lailin tamen, namo, tamen zunxun zhengdao bi shenguo renhe yige minzu. Dang jinggao zhe lailin tamen de shihou, tamen que gengjia beimiu

zai difang shang gengjia zi da, gengjia tumoubugui. Yinmou zhi kun qi chuangzuo zhe, tamen chule dengdai guren suo zaoshou de changdao wai, hai neng dengdai shenme ne? Duiyu an la de changdao, ni jue buneng faxian renhe biangeng; duiyu an la de changdao, ni buneng faxian renhe bianqian

Nandao tamen meiyou zai da dishang luxing, yi guancha qian ren de jieju shi zenyang de ma? Qian ren bi tamen shili geng da. An la shi tiandi jian renhe wu buneng shi ta wunai de, ta que shi quanzhi de, que shi quanneng de

Jiaruo an la wei shiren suo fan de zui'e er chengzhi tamen, name, ta bu liu yigeren zai dimian shang, dan ta rang tamen yanchi dao yige dingqi, dang tamen de dingqi lailin de shihou,(ta jiang yi tamen de xingwei er baochou tamen), yin wei an la que shi mingcha ta de zhong pu de
Ya xin
Yi zhihui de “gulanjing” fashi
ni que shi zhong shizhe zhi yi
ni dique shi zai zheng lushang (bei paiqian de shizhe zhi yi)
Wanneng zhi ci de zhu jiang shi ci jing
yibian ni jinggao yizu ren, tamen de zuxian wei bei jinggaoguo, suoyi tamen shi shuhu dayi de
Tamen zhong da duoshu ren que yi yingdang shou panjue, suoyi tamen bu xindao
Wo que yi ba jiasuo fang zai tamen de bozi shang, naxie jiasuo dadao xiaba, suoyi tamen buneng ditou
Wo zai tamen de mianqian anzhi yige zhang'ai, zai tamen de houmian anzhi yige zhang'ai, mengbile tamen, suoyi tamen kan bujian
Ni dui tamen jiayi jinggao yu fou, zhe zai tamen shi yiyang de, tamen bijing bu xindao
Ni zhi neng jinggao na zunshou jiaohui, erqie zai mimi zhong jingwei zhiren zhu zhe, ni yao yi she youhe youhou de baochou xiang ta baoxi
Wo biding yao shi siren fuhuo, wo biding yao jilu tamen suozuo de shan e, he tamen de shiji; wo jiang yiqie shiwu, xiangming di jilu zai yi ce mingbai de fanben zhong
Ni dang yi chengshi de jumin wei tamen she yige piyu. Dangshi, shizhemen lailin naxie jumin

Dangshi, wo ceng paiqian liang ge shizhe qu jiaohua naxie jumin, dan tamen fouren ta lia de shiming, wo jiu yi di san ge shizhe qu yuanzhu ta lia. Tamen shuo:“Women que shi bei paiqian lai jiaohua nimen de.”
Tamen shuo:“Nimen zhishi xiang women yiyang de fanren. Zhiren zhu meiyou jiang shi renhe wu, nimen zhishi shuohuang de.”
Tamen shuo:“Women de zhu zhidao, women que shi bei paiqian lai jiaohua nimen de
women zhi fu mingbai de chuanda de zeren.”
Tamen shuo:“Women que yi wei nimen er zao eyun, ruguo nimen bu tingzhi xuanchuan, women shi biyong shi ji nimen, huo yi tongku de xingfa jia yu nimen.”
Tamen shuo:“Nimen de eyun shi bansuizhe nimen de. Nandao youren jiaohui nimen,(nimen cai wei ta er zao eyun me?) Buran! Nimen shi guofen de minzhong.”
You yi ge ren cong chengzhong zui yuan di difang pao lai shuo:“Wo de zongzu ya! Nimen yingdang shuncong shizhemen
nimen yingdang shuncong naxie zunxun zhengdao, er bu xiang nimen suoqu baochou de renmen.”
(You shuo):“Wo zen neng bu chongbai na chuangzaole wo, er nimen jiang bei zhao guiyu ta de zhuzai ne
Nandao wo neng she ta er jing shi yixie shenling ma? Ruguo zhiren zhu yu jiang zai yu wo, ze tamen de shuo qing, duiyu wo hao wu biyi, tamen ye buneng zhengjiu wo
Ruguo nayang, wo que shi zai mingxian de mi wu zhong
Wo que yi gui xin nimen de zhu, gu nimen yingdang tingcong wo.”
You shengyin dui ta shuo:“Ni ru leyuan ba!” Ta shuo:“Dan yuan wo de zongzu zhidao
wo de zhu yi she you wo, bing shi wo chengwei shou youdai zhe!”
Zai ta zhihou, wo meiyou jiang tianshi qu chengzhi ta de zongzu, wo ye bu changchang jiang tianshi
Cai tingjian yisheng nahan, tamen jiu miewangle
Ai zai zhong pu! Zhiyao you shizhe lai jiaohua tamen, tamen bian jiayi yunong
Nandao tamen bu zhidao ma? Zai tamen zhiqian, wo ceng huimiele xuduo shidai, naxie bei huimie de shidai yong bu zhuan hui chenshi
Tamen jiang tongtong bei jujin zai wo nali
Tamen youyi zhong jixiang: Yi si de dadi, wo shi ta fuhuo, wo shi ta shengzhang liangshi, yi zuo tamen de shipin
Wo zai da dishang chuangzao xuduo ye zao yuan, putao yuan, wo shi xuduo yuanquan, cong dixia yong chu
yibian tamen shi qi guoshi. Zhexie guoshi bushi tamen de shou zao chulai de, nandao tamen bu ganxie me
Zansong an la, chaojue wanwu! Ta chuangzao yiqie pei'ou, dimian suo chansheng de, tamen ziji, yiji tamen suo bu zhidao de,(dou you pei'ou)
Tamen youyi zhong jixiang: Wo shi baizhou tuoli heiye, tamen bian huran zai hei'an zhong
Taiyang ji xing, zhi yiding suo, na shi wanneng de, quanzhi de zhu suo yuding de
Yueliang, wo wei ta yuding gong su, zhidao ta zai bian cheng xiang ganku de ye zao zhi yiyang
Taiyang bude zhuiji yueliang, heiye ye bude chaoyue baizhou, ge zai yige guidao shang fuyouzhe
Tamen youyi zhong jixiang: Wo shi tamen de zisun, chengzuo manzai de chuanbo
Wo wei tamen er chuangzao chuanbo nayang ke gong qi cheng de dongxi
Ruguo wo yiyu, wo jiu ba tamen yan si, er tamen meiyou renhe yuanzhu zhe, tamen jiang bu huo zhengjiu
chufei shi yinwei wo de enhui, yinwei wo yao shi tamen xiangle dao mou shi
Ruguo you shengyin dui tamen shuo:“Nimen dang jingwei zai nimen zhiqian de, he zai nimen zhihou de, yibian nimen meng zhu de lianmin.”
Mei feng tamen de zhu de yi zhong jixiang lailin tamen, tamen bian beiqi ta

Ruguo you shengyin dui tamen shuo:“Nimen yingdang fen she an la suo ciyu nimen de.” Name, bu xindao zhe jiang dui xindao zhe shuo:“An la yu gongyang shei jiu gongyang shei, women hebi gongyang ta ne? Nimen zhishi zai mingxian de mi wu zhong.”
Tamen shuo:“Zhege jinggao shenme shihou shixian ne? Ruguo nimen shi shuo shihua de.”
Tamen zhi dengdai yisheng nahan, zai tamen fenzheng de shihou, xiji tamen
tamen jianglai bu neng li yizhu, ye buneng hui jia qu
Haojiao yi xiang, tamen jiu cong fenmu chulai, ben xiang tamen de zhu
Tamen jiang shuo:“Shang zai women! Shei jiang women cong women de wo chu huanxing? Zhe shi zhiren zhu suo yingxu women de, shizhemen yi shuo shihuale.”
Cai tingjian yisheng nahan, tamen jiu tongtong bei jujin zai wo zheli
Zai na ri, renhe ren bu shou sihao wang qu; nimen zhi yi ziji de xingwei er shou baochou
Leyuan de jumin zai na ri que shi congshi yu yukuai de
Tamen he ziji de pei'ou, zai shu yin xia, kao zai chuangshang
Tamen zai leyuan zhong, jiang you shuiguo, bing you tamen suo yaoqiu de endian
“Ping'an!” Zhe shi cong zhi ci zhu fachu de zhuci
“Fanzui de renmen ya! Jinri nimen dang tuibi dao yibian qu
A dan de houyi a! Nandao wo meiyou zhufuguo nimen ma? Wo shuo nimen buyao chongbai emo, ta que shi nimen de choudi
Nimen yingdang chongbai wo, zhe shi zhenglu
Ta que shi xuduo ren mi wu, nandao nimen bumingbai ma
Zhe shi congqian changchang yong lai konghe nimen de huo yu
Nimen shengqian bu ken xindao, suoyi nimen jinri dang ru huo yu.”
Zai na ri, wo jiang fengbi tamen de kou, tamen de shou jiang dui wo shuohua, tamen de jiao jiang zuozheng tamen suo xing de shan e
Jiaruo wo yiyu, wo bi huimie tamen de yanjing, ranhou tamen mangzhe zoulu, dan tamen zen neng kanjian ne
Jiaruo wo yiyu, wo bi shi tamen zai ziji de jiazhong bianxing, ranhou tamen ji buneng qianjin, you buneng houtui
wo shi shei changshou, wo jiangdi shei de tizhi. Nandao tamen bu ming li me
Wo meiyou jiao ta shige, shige duiyu ta shi bu xiangyi de. Zhege zhishi jiaohui he mingbai de “gulanjing”
yibian ta jinggao huo ren, yibian bu xindao de renmen dang shou xingfa de panjue
Nandao tamen bu zhidao ma? Cong wo suo qinshou zao zuozhe zhi zhong, wo ceng wei tamen er chuangzao shengchu, er tamen guanli tamen
Wo wei tamen er zhifu shengchu, yi yibufen gong tamen qi, yibufen gong tamen chi
Tamen keyou tamen huode xuduo liyi he yinliao. Tamen zenme hai bu ganxie ne
Tamen she an la er jing shi xuduo shenling, xiwang ziji huode yuanzhu
Naxie shenling buneng yuanzhu tamen, tamen que shi wei naxie shenling er bei jihe de jundui
Suoyi buyao rang tamen de wangyan shi ni youchou. Wo dique zhidao tamen suoyinni de, he tamen suo biaoxian de
Nandao ren hai bu zhidao ma? Wo ceng yong jingye chuangzao ta, er tamen huran bian cheng tanbai de kangbian zhe
Ta wei wo shele yige piyu, er ta wangquele wo ceng chuangzao ta. Ta shuo:“Shei neng shi xiu gu fuhuo ne?”
Ni shuo:“Zuichu chuangzao ta de, jiang shi ta fuhuo; ta shi quanzhi yiqie zhongsheng de
Ta wei nimen yong lu shu chuangzao huo, nimen bian yong na lu shu ran huo.”
Nandao neng zao tiandi de, buneng zaoxiang tamen nayang de ren ma? Buran! Ta que shi shan zao de, que shi quanzhi de
Dang ta yu zaohua renhe shiwu de shihou, ta de shiqing zhishi shuo sheng:“You”, ta jiu youle
Zansong an la, chaojue wanwu! Yiqie shiwu de zhuquan dou zhangwo zai ta de shouzhong, nimen zhi bei zhao guiyu ta
